R=
odimus, Cyclonus and Scourge walked out of Scorponok, following Perceptor. =
It is obvious that none of the trio were up for battle as they were still b=
eaten and battered from thier own conflicts earlier. They swiftly move into=
 the base, making thier way towards the recharging chambers. 

Skorponok sh=
ifted form as well, Zarak, once again merging with him so they became one b=
eing once more. In his massive robot mode, he too towards the base, glancin=
g around at the ruined landscape he shook his head and then passed inside f=
ollowing Rodimus and crew. 

OOC: Pretty much Rodimus, Cyclonus, Scourge an=
d Scorponok will be going to the recharge chambers, seeing as they were pre=
tty much on the frontlines of the last battle and are in need of repairs, u=
nless something else intervenes.
